Holiday Money Get in touch Book a video call Make an enquiry Call 0800 713 715 Help Get in touch Back INCLUDES BREAKFAST, DINNER & DRINKS KIDS STAY, PLAY & EAT FREE* View gallery / Back Shangri La Fiji Lagoon Pool (Hero shot) Shangri La Fiji Reef Wing Pool Aerial Shangri La Fijian Resort Spa 9 Hole Peter Thomson Golf Course Shangri La Aerial View Shangri La snorkelling Shangri La waterpark Fiji Shangri-La Yanuca Island, Fiji &vert; Return flights • 5 nights • Transfers • Breakfast & Dinner • Selected drinks Overview Inclusions Room Type Terms & Conditions Nestled in its own 109-acre private island which is conveniently connected to the main island by a causeway, the resort is just a 45-minute drive from Nadi International Airport. Shangri-La Yanuca Island, Fiji offers a pristine blue lagoon packed with coral and sea life, palm-fringed white sand beaches, tropical gardens and magnificent ocean views. All 442 rooms have private balconies boasting panoramic views of the lagoon or Pacific Ocean. Shangri-La Yanuca Island, Fiji participate in the Loloma Hour, dubbed "The world's first happy hour for the environment". Shangri-La Yanuca Island, Fiji is offering local flora & fauna walks, kids culture programs, coral planting and mangrove planting. For more information about Loloma Hour and what it offers click HERE . View more View less 5 nights + flights, transfers, breakfast, dinner, drinks & more from $ 2969 per person share twin Flying with Air New Zealand INCLUDES BREAKFAST, DINNER & DRINKS KIDS STAY, PLAY & EAT FREE* Enquire now Sale Period : until 21 Nov 25 by 4pm or until sold out Deal Includes: Return Economy class (The Works) airfares flying Air New Zealand from Auckland, Wellington*, Christchurch* to Nadi Add $180 per person return to fly from your nearest Air New Zealand serviced domestic airport 5 nights accommodation Return Nadi airport transfers Breakfast & dinner daily* Beverage Package from 12pm-10pm daily including Beers (Local & International, Bottle or On Tap), Wine by the Glass, Selected Cocktails, Standard Spirits, Soft Drinks, Juices and Bottled Water, one (1) soft drink or juice is included for up to two (2) children 11 years & under per room when dining with a paying parent. (available at all outlets apart from Black Marlin, Marau Village & in room dining) *KIDS Stay & Eat FREE (max 2 kids, 0-11yrs) *KIDS Play FREE (5-11yrs Little Chiefs Kids Club) FREE Wi-Fi FREE use of non-motorised water sports, tennis court & marine education centre Treat yourself and upgrade your flights! Upgrade to Premium Economy from $280 per person return from Auckland Upgrade to Business Premier from $640 per person return from Auckland Based on travel: 25 Nov-12 Dec 25, 06 Jan-31 Mar, 20 Apr-29 Jun & 20 Jul-20 Sep 26 Room Types Departs From Auckland Wellington Christchurch from Auckland Yanuca Lagoon Deluxe Drawing inspiration from the natural surroundings, the Yanuca Lagoon Deluxe Rooms provide easy access to the resort's main attractions, all while incorporating traditional Fijian design elements. Auckland 5 night package from $2969 per person share twin Additional nights from $419 per person share twin Kids Fly from $569 per child (2-11yrs, Max 2) extra night FREE Travel 28 Jan - 31 Mar 26 Auckland 5 night package from $3209 per person share twin Additional nights from $469 per person share twin Kids Fly from $569 per child (2-11yrs, Max 2) extra night FREE Travel 01 May - 29 Jun 26 Auckland 5 night package from $3319 per person share twin Additional nights from $489 per person share twin Kids Fly from $569 per child (2-11yrs, Max 2) extra night FREE Travel 20 Jul - 20 Sep 26 Wellington 5 night package from $2969 per person share twin Additional nights from $419 per person share twin Kids Fly from $569 per child (2-11yrs, Max 2) extra night FREE Travel 28 Jan - 31 Mar 26 Wellington 5 night package from $3209 per person share twin Additional nights from $469 per person share twin Kids Fly from $569 per child (2-11yrs, Max 2) extra night FREE Travel 01 May - 29 Jun 26 Wellington 5 night package from $3319 per person share twin Additional nights from $489 per person share twin Kids Fly from $569 per child (2-11yrs, Max 2) extra night FREE Travel 20 Jul - 20 Sep 26 Christchurch 5 night package from $2969 per person share twin Additional nights from $419 per person share twin Kids Fly from $569 per child (2-11yrs, Max 2) extra night FREE Travel 28 Jan - 31 Mar 26 Christchurch 5 night package from $3209 per person share twin Additional nights from $469 per person share twin Kids Fly from $569 per child (2-11yrs, Max 2) extra night FREE Travel 01 May - 29 Jun 26 Christchurch 5 night package from $3319 per person share twin Additional nights from $489 per person share twin Kids Fly from $569 per child (2-11yrs, Max 2) extra night FREE Travel 20 Jul - 20 Sep 26 Families come in all shapes and sizes. If the advertised room type doesn't suit your family, or you'd like to travel outside the advertised dates, please ask us for a customised quote below. Fiji sightseeing optional add-ons Malamala Beach Club – Full Day Tour Fiji’s only island beach club, just 25 minutes from Port Denarau is the perfect option to add onto your mainland stay. Day pass club entry includes return Denarau Marina transfers and allows you to enjoy the white sand beaches, pristine lagoon waters, a resort style infinity edge pool and beachside cabanas (surcharged). Delicious island cuisine and beverages are available, along with an island massage spa menu (additional charges apply). Half Day Tours are available – ask us for more information. Includes: Hotel transfers, return vessel transfers from Port Denarau to Malamala, free WiFi, on island towel service, use of non-motorised watersports equipment. Note: No discounts for children. Operates: Daily Duration: 7 hours Price from $149 per adult, $149 per child (3+ yrs) Travel: 01 Apr 25-31 Mar 26 Sigatoka River Safari Sigatoka River Safari is Fiji’s must -do experience, offering all guests a uniquely Fijian half day adventure into the heart and soul of Fiji. The jet boat and village safari tour includes a welcome kava ceremony, guided village tour, lunch, entertainment and jet boat thrill ride. Includes: Hotel transfers, village visit, jetboat tour and lunch Operates : Mon-Sat Duration: 4.5 hours Price from $265 per adult, $135 per child (4-15 years) Travel : 01 Apr 25-31 Mar 26 Off Road Cave Safari Fiji’s only Off-Road Cave Safari offers a half day of adventure deep into the valleys of Viti Levu. The tour is rich in history and you’ll experience Fiji’s largest cave system – Naihehe Cave, originally home to the Nabuavatu village during the tribal warfare days. The tour takes you on a journey to how the cave was used as defence and to seek refuge from enemies. Includes: Hotel transfers, BBQ lunch, snacks Operates: Mon-Sat Duration: 4.5 hours Price from $239 per adult, $129 per child (4-15 years) Travel: 01 Apr 25-31 Mar 26 South Sea Sailing - Sabre This full-day sailing experience on the 78-foot sailing catamaran SABRE, will cruise through the Mamanuca Islands, where onboard you can shelter under shaded canopies, seating booths, day beds or relax on one of many bean bags. During the day, you’ll stop to snorkel, or swim at the tropical reef or sand cay. Gourmet buffet lunch is served along with a complimentary selection of local beer and wine for 2 hours (served from lunchtime onwards), soft drinks, and mineral water (served all day). It’s an fantastic tour to add on to your mainland resort package. Includes: Hotel transfers, catamaran sailing experience, use of snorkelling gear, buffet lunch, complimentary selection of local beer and wine for 2 hours (served from lunchtime onwards) complimentary soft drinks and bottled mineral water (served all day) Operates: Daily Duration: 7 hours Price from $205 per adult, $105 per child (5-15 years) Travel: 01 Apr 25-31 Mar 26 Cloud 9 Fiji Here’s an unreal, ridiculously relaxing way to round off your mainland stay – a bar and gourmet pizzeria floating in the middle of the ocean. Sun decks, hanging chairs, day beds and clear turquoise water all around. Out of this world! Includes a FJ$60 credit. Includes: Hotel transfers, return vessel transfers from Port Denarau to Cloud9, F$60 credit for onboard food and drinks. Operates: Daily Duration: 6 hours Price from $269 per adult, $245 per child (10-15 years) Travel: 01 Apr 25-31 Mar 26 Captain Cook - Island & Reef Day Sail A must-do Fijian, barefoot Island experience on your own private tropical island beach. Set sail for the spectacular Kadavu Lailai Private Beach in the Mamanucas. Enjoy the pristine white sandy beach and acres of coral gardens where you can spend the day snorkelling, paddle boarding, kayaking or playing beach volleyball with the crew. Join a nature walk and/or guided marine tour with our resident Marine Biologists and take part in the ‘Build a Reef’ coral restoration program. There is also the Captains Kids Club to keep the little ones engaged while you spend some ‘me’ time relaxing or snorkelling. Enjoy a fresh tropical BBQ buffet lunch with an ice-cold beer, house wine or juice and enjoy listening to the soulful voices of the Fijian crew as they serenade you while you eat and take in the spectacular views. Operates: Daily Duration: 10am-5pm Price from $245 per adult, $155 per child (3-15 years) Travel: 01 Jun 25-31 Mar 26 Terms & Conditions Sale ends 21 Nov 25 or until sold out • Prices are correct as at 04 Nov 25 • Prices are thereafter subject to change without notice until time of confirmation. Prices may vary due to a number of factors including tax and surcharge increases, exchange rate movements and availability • Packages are applicable for new bookings only. Package prices are based on return Economy class flying Air New Zealand (The Works) to Nadi from Auckland, Wellington* & Christchurch* (*Wellington & Christchurch via Auckland). • Upgrades to Premier Economy & Business Premier only valid on the AKL-NAN-AKL sector, domestic flights to/from Auckland will be in Economy class, upgrades only for travel between 25 Nov-12 Dec 25, 06 Jan-31 Mar, 20 Apr-29 Jun & 20 Jul-20 Sep 26. • If additional accommodation is required due to flight schedules this is at customers own expense . Airfares are based on the most direct routing but may vary depending on subsequent tax & surcharge increases. • All travel must be commenced and completed as specified • Some surcharges, closeouts, flight, routing and accommodation restrictions apply • Bedding configurations may vary • Any value adds or meal/beverage packages that are unused are not refundable, transferable & cannot be exchanged for cash • If adding a * Half board is capped at the below amounts, any spend over this at the resort on meals will be charged upon check out: Travel until 31MAR26: FJ$101.25pp per day. Travel from 01APR26-31MAR27: FJ$109.13pp per day • Min/max stays apply • Full payment is required at time of booking • Availability during school holiday & peak travel periods may be limited • Advertised prices are per person share twin based on payment by cash or eftpos. Credit card fees will apply • Airfares are non-refundable, non-transferable and name changes are not permitted • Amendment and cancellation fees apply • Child costs where advertised are based on up to 2 children 11 years and under sharing accommodation with 2 adults using existing bedding • Where Kids eat free, this is from selected restaurants, from selected menus at set times • Kids club age restrictions apply • Accommodation ratings are based on House of Travel ratings and are a guide only to the overall quality of the property. • Packages are subject to availability. Please talk to your House of Travel consultant for the most up to date availability and pricing. * FINANCE CONDITIONS: Lending criteria, fees, terms & conditions apply. Offer available for bookings made with House of Travel only. Not available for bookings made with MixandMatch. For finance terms and conditions visit hot.co.nz/payment-options. Sightseeing conditions: Prices are valid as at 01 Nov 24, but may vary depending on exchange rates. The price guide shown is a per person from price and is based on low season travel. Travel must be completed by 31 Mar 26 unless otherwise stated, closeout dates may apply. Min/max numbers may apply for tours to operate. Fuel surcharges may be applied without notice payable direct. Tours and sightseeing are subject to change and additional transfers may be required to connect with tours – these will be an additional cost, please ask your House of Travel consultant.
